Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I'm BriXman, also known as BriXmanGameNerd or just Brix.

Recently, I was browsing the Fan works forums, and stumbled across my friend UpsilonAerospace's thread, the Debris Series (check it out!), awesome pen drawings of different craft debris. This inspired me to start drawing again! So I started drawing.

I also draw some War Thunder, here.

After about all in all 3 hours of thinking, raging and drawing, this was the product. I'm calling it Stranded at Eve. It's not coloured unfortunatley, but I might do that later on. Might as well do more, tell me what you think! My drawing skills are not the best, just warning you, but I'd like to get feedback and suggestions to my drawing.

Stranded at Eve 12th of July 2014.

Ludford Kerman had performed a successful landing on Eve, and after planting a flag and taking samples, he was suppost to get back into the capsule. However, Ludford had forgot to deactivate the autopilot, thus sending the rocket up towards space without Ludford.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Something I drew in school, not coloured fully, but nice.

A small comic-like image, explaining one of the most annoying problems you have in KSP. Enjoy.

Tell me what you think!

-Brix

Edited July 19, 2014 by BriXman

I like this!

Thanks! Do you want me to do more? Because I'm in the works of some real life aircraft drawing, could probably make some KSP as well!
Nice picture, but a bit more shadows would be nice!

Thanks! Do you want me to do more? Because I'm in the works of some real life aircraft drawing, could probably make some KSP as well!

I would like to see that.

I would like to see that.

Cool, more coming soon!

Alert!: New fan!

Hehe, thank you, mate!

I also now draw War Thunder planes, link is in the original post. KSP image coming today and another one today/tomorrow/later!
Is that stuff from the WT live forum? Cause if so, there is some wicked stuff on there!

Is that stuff from the WT live forum? Cause if so, there is some wicked stuff on there!

Well do you mean I have drawn stuff from live.warthunder.com? If so no.

Well do you mean I have drawn stuff from live.warthunder.com? If so no.

That's what I meant ish, yea, still, I'd like to see more of this and WT!

That's what I meant ish, yea, still, I'd like to see more of this and WT!

More coming today, both War Thunder and KSP!

Post more!!! I like!

I like that you like! But my current project takes lots of time, will put up an image tomorrow!

New image!

Something I drew in school, not coloured fully, but nice.

A small comic-like image, explaining one of the most annoying problems you have in KSP. Enjoy.

New image coming out soon, it's taking some time, so I uploaded this while you're waiting.

-Brix
